mapper.select: select id, co_id, w_id, s_id, number from asms.stock2 where id = #{id}

SELECT f.id,f.number,g.s_name AS sName,g.store_name,g.co_name,g.co_code,g.m_name,g.md_title,g.is_name,g.ci_name,g.applimodel,g.specialmodel,g.co_retailprice,g.barcode,g.cusprice,g.upx,g.lox FROM stock2 AS f LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.co_id,a.co_code,a.upx,a.lox,a.co_name,a.co_retailprice,a.specialmodel,a.barcode,a.cusprice,a.applimodel,b.m_name,c.md_title,d.is_name,e.ci_name,h.s_name,i.store_name FROM commodity AS a LEFT JOIN materialbrand AS b ON a.m_id = b.m_id LEFT JOIN measuringunit AS c ON a.mu_id = c.mu_id LEFT JOIN installationsites AS d ON a.is_id = d.is_id LEFT JOIN materialclassification AS e ON a.ci_id = e.ci_id LEFT JOIN store AS h ON a.s_id = h.s_id LEFT JOIN warehouse AS i ON a.w_id = i.w_id WHERE a.warning = 1) AS g ON f.co_id = g.co_id
